name: Squad of Thugs
conimmunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Power in Numbers
traits.desc: The swarm has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if the swarm has at least half of its maximum hit points.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Medium bandit. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Maces
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow Barrage
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d10) piercing damage, or 5 (1d10) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
